21namespace webrtc {
22
23const int kRecordingFixedSampleRate = 48000;
24const size_t kRecordingNumChannels = 2;
25const int kPlayoutFixedSampleRate = 48000;
26const size_t kPlayoutNumChannels = 2;
27const size_t kPlayoutBufferSize =
28 kPlayoutFixedSampleRate / 100 * kPlayoutNumChannels * 2;
29const size_t kRecordingBufferSize =
30 kRecordingFixedSampleRate / 100 * kRecordingNumChannels * 2;
31
32FileAudioDevice::FileAudioDevice(const char* inputFilename,
33 const char* outputFilename)
34 : _ptrAudioBuffer(NULL),
35 _recordingBuffer(NULL),
36 _playoutBuffer(NULL),
37 _recordingFramesLeft(0),
38 _playoutFramesLeft(0),
39 _recordingBufferSizeIn10MS(0),
40 _recordingFramesIn10MS(0),
41 _playoutFramesIn10MS(0),
42 _playing(false),
43 _recording(false),
44 _lastCallPlayoutMillis(0),
45 _lastCallRecordMillis(0),
46 _outputFilename(outputFilename),
47 _inputFilename(inputFilename) {}
48
49FileAudioDevice::~FileAudioDevice() {}
50
51int32_t FileAudioDevice::ActiveAudioLayer(
52 AudioDeviceModule::AudioLayer& audioLayer) const {
53 return -1;
54}
55
56AudioDeviceGeneric::InitStatus FileAudioDevice::Init() {
57 return InitStatus::OK;
58}
59
60int32_t FileAudioDevice::Terminate() {
61 return 0;
62}
63
64bool FileAudioDevice::Initialized() const {
65 return true;
66}
67
68int16_t FileAudioDevice::PlayoutDevices() {
69 return 1;
70}
71
72int16_t FileAudioDevice::RecordingDevices() {
73 return 1;
74}
75
76int32_t FileAudioDevice::PlayoutDeviceName(uint16_t index,
77 char name[kAdmMaxDeviceNameSize],
78 char guid[kAdmMaxGuidSize]) {
79 const char* kName = "dummy_device";
80 const char* kGuid = "dummy_device_unique_id";
81 if (index < 1) {
82 memset(name, 0, kAdmMaxDeviceNameSize);
83 memset(guid, 0, kAdmMaxGuidSize);
84 memcpy(name, kName, strlen(kName));
85 memcpy(guid, kGuid, strlen(guid));
86 return 0;
87 }
88 return -1;
89}
90
91int32_t FileAudioDevice::RecordingDeviceName(uint16_t index,
92 char name[kAdmMaxDeviceNameSize],
93 char guid[kAdmMaxGuidSize]) {
94 const char* kName = "dummy_device";
95 const char* kGuid = "dummy_device_unique_id";
96 if (index < 1) {
97 memset(name, 0, kAdmMaxDeviceNameSize);
98 memset(guid, 0, kAdmMaxGuidSize);
99 memcpy(name, kName, strlen(kName));
100 memcpy(guid, kGuid, strlen(guid));
101 return 0;
102 }
103 return -1;
104}
105
106int32_t FileAudioDevice::SetPlayoutDevice(uint16_t index) {
107 if (index == 0) {
108 _playout_index = index;
109 return 0;
110 }
111 return -1;
112}
113
114int32_t FileAudioDevice::SetPlayoutDevice(
115 AudioDeviceModule::WindowsDeviceType device) {
116 return -1;
117}
118
119int32_t FileAudioDevice::SetRecordingDevice(uint16_t index) {
120 if (index == 0) {
121 _record_index = index;
122 return _record_index;
123 }
124 return -1;
125}
126
127int32_t FileAudioDevice::SetRecordingDevice(
128 AudioDeviceModule::WindowsDeviceType device) {
129 return -1;
130}
131
132int32_t FileAudioDevice::PlayoutIsAvailable(bool& available) {
133 if (_playout_index == 0) {
134 available = true;
135 return _playout_index;
136 }
137 available = false;
138 return -1;
139}
140
141int32_t FileAudioDevice::InitPlayout() {
142 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
143
144 if (_playing) {
145 return -1;
146 }
147
148 _playoutFramesIn10MS = static_cast<size_t>(kPlayoutFixedSampleRate / 100);
149
150 if (_ptrAudioBuffer) {
151 // Update webrtc audio buffer with the selected parameters
152 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetPlayoutSampleRate(kPlayoutFixedSampleRate);
153 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetPlayoutChannels(kPlayoutNumChannels);
154 }
155 return 0;
156}
157
158bool FileAudioDevice::PlayoutIsInitialized() const {
159 return _playoutFramesIn10MS != 0;
160}
161
162int32_t FileAudioDevice::RecordingIsAvailable(bool& available) {
163 if (_record_index == 0) {
164 available = true;
165 return _record_index;
166 }
167 available = false;
168 return -1;
169}
170
171int32_t FileAudioDevice::InitRecording() {
172 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
173
174 if (_recording) {
175 return -1;
176 }
177
178 _recordingFramesIn10MS = static_cast<size_t>(kRecordingFixedSampleRate / 100);
179
180 if (_ptrAudioBuffer) {
181 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetRecordingSampleRate(kRecordingFixedSampleRate);
182 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetRecordingChannels(kRecordingNumChannels);
183 }
184 return 0;
185}
186
187bool FileAudioDevice::RecordingIsInitialized() const {
188 return _recordingFramesIn10MS != 0;
189}
190
191int32_t FileAudioDevice::StartPlayout() {
192 if (_playing) {
193 return 0;
194 }
195
196 _playing = true;
197 _playoutFramesLeft = 0;
198
199 if (!_playoutBuffer) {
200 _playoutBuffer = new int8_t[kPlayoutBufferSize];
201 }
202 if (!_playoutBuffer) {
203 _playing = false;
204 return -1;
205 }
206
207 // PLAYOUT
208 if (!_outputFilename.empty()) {
209 _outputFile = FileWrapper::OpenWriteOnly(_outputFilename.c_str());
210 if (!_outputFile.is_open()) {
211 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "Failed to open playout file: " << _outputFilename;
212 _playing = false;
213 delete[] _playoutBuffer;
214 _playoutBuffer = NULL;
215 return -1;
216 }
217 }
218
219 _ptrThreadPlay = rtc::PlatformThread::SpawnJoinable(
220 [this] {
221 while (PlayThreadProcess()) {
222 }
223 },
224 "webrtc_audio_module_play_thread",
225 rtc::ThreadAttributes().SetPriority(rtc::ThreadPriority::kRealtime));
226
227 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Started playout capture to output file: "
228 << _outputFilename;
229 return 0;
230}
231
232int32_t FileAudioDevice::StopPlayout() {
233 {
234 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
235 _playing = false;
236 }
237
238 // stop playout thread first
239 if (!_ptrThreadPlay.empty())
240 _ptrThreadPlay.Finalize();
241
242 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
243
244 _playoutFramesLeft = 0;
245 delete[] _playoutBuffer;
246 _playoutBuffer = NULL;
247 _outputFile.Close();
248
249 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Stopped playout capture to output file: "
250 << _outputFilename;
251 return 0;
252}
253
254bool FileAudioDevice::Playing() const {
255 return _playing;
256}
257
258int32_t FileAudioDevice::StartRecording() {
259 _recording = true;
260
261 // Make sure we only create the buffer once.
262 _recordingBufferSizeIn10MS =
263 _recordingFramesIn10MS * kRecordingNumChannels * 2;
264 if (!_recordingBuffer) {
265 _recordingBuffer = new int8_t[_recordingBufferSizeIn10MS];
266 }
267
268 if (!_inputFilename.empty()) {
269 _inputFile = FileWrapper::OpenReadOnly(_inputFilename.c_str());
270 if (!_inputFile.is_open()) {
271 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "Failed to open audio input file: "
272 << _inputFilename;
273 _recording = false;
274 delete[] _recordingBuffer;
275 _recordingBuffer = NULL;
276 return -1;
277 }
278 }
279
280 _ptrThreadRec = rtc::PlatformThread::SpawnJoinable(
281 [this] {
282 while (RecThreadProcess()) {
283 }
284 },
285 "webrtc_audio_module_capture_thread",
286 rtc::ThreadAttributes().SetPriority(rtc::ThreadPriority::kRealtime));
287
288 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Started recording from input file: " << _inputFilename;
289
290 return 0;
291}
292
293int32_t FileAudioDevice::StopRecording() {
294 {
295 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
296 _recording = false;
297 }
298
299 if (!_ptrThreadRec.empty())
300 _ptrThreadRec.Finalize();
301
302 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
303 _recordingFramesLeft = 0;
304 if (_recordingBuffer) {
305 delete[] _recordingBuffer;
306 _recordingBuffer = NULL;
307 }
308 _inputFile.Close();
309
310 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Stopped recording from input file: " << _inputFilename;
311 return 0;
312}
313
314bool FileAudioDevice::Recording() const {
315 return _recording;
316}

428
429void FileAudioDevice::AttachAudioBuffer(AudioDeviceBuffer* audioBuffer) {
430 MutexLock lock(&mutex_);
431
432 _ptrAudioBuffer = audioBuffer;
433
434 // Inform the AudioBuffer about default settings for this implementation.
435 // Set all values to zero here since the actual settings will be done by
436 // InitPlayout and InitRecording later.
437 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetRecordingSampleRate(0);
438 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetPlayoutSampleRate(0);
439 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetRecordingChannels(0);
440 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetPlayoutChannels(0);
441}
442
443bool FileAudioDevice::PlayThreadProcess() {
444 if (!_playing) {
445 return false;
446 }
447 int64_t currentTime = rtc::TimeMillis();
448 mutex_.Lock();
449
450 if (_lastCallPlayoutMillis == 0 ||
451 currentTime - _lastCallPlayoutMillis >= 10) {
452 mutex_.Unlock();
453 _ptrAudioBuffer->RequestPlayoutData(_playoutFramesIn10MS);
454 mutex_.Lock();
455
456 _playoutFramesLeft = _ptrAudioBuffer->GetPlayoutData(_playoutBuffer);
457 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(_playoutFramesIn10MS, _playoutFramesLeft);
458 if (_outputFile.is_open()) {
459 _outputFile.Write(_playoutBuffer, kPlayoutBufferSize);
460 }
461 _lastCallPlayoutMillis = currentTime;
462 }
463 _playoutFramesLeft = 0;
464 mutex_.Unlock();
465
466 int64_t deltaTimeMillis = rtc::TimeMillis() - currentTime;
467 if (deltaTimeMillis < 10) {
468 SleepMs(10 - deltaTimeMillis);
469 }
470
471 return true;
472}
473
474bool FileAudioDevice::RecThreadProcess() {
475 if (!_recording) {
476 return false;
477 }
478
479 int64_t currentTime = rtc::TimeMillis();
480 mutex_.Lock();
481
482 if (_lastCallRecordMillis == 0 || currentTime - _lastCallRecordMillis >= 10) {
483 if (_inputFile.is_open()) {
484 if (_inputFile.Read(_recordingBuffer, kRecordingBufferSize) > 0) {
485 _ptrAudioBuffer->SetRecordedBuffer(_recordingBuffer,
486 _recordingFramesIn10MS);
487 } else {
488 _inputFile.Rewind();
489 }
490 _lastCallRecordMillis = currentTime;
491 mutex_.Unlock();
492 _ptrAudioBuffer->DeliverRecordedData();
493 mutex_.Lock();
494 }
495 }
496
497 mutex_.Unlock();
498
499 int64_t deltaTimeMillis = rtc::TimeMillis() - currentTime;
500 if (deltaTimeMillis < 10) {
501 SleepMs(10 - deltaTimeMillis);
502 }
503
504 return true;
505}
506
